heading: Add a Worry
subheading: Add a worry so you can remember it during your worry time.
paragraphs: This should take 30 seconds or less.
If you want to add a bit more, go ahead but make it quick (it can help if you write down what you're afraid will happen).
Once it's in, you've contained it! So you can let it go until your worry time.

If you're struggling to let it go, try not to judge yourself or tell yourself to “stop worrying”, just gently remind yourself that you will have a chance to worry about that during your worry time & get back to what you were doing.
